mapper.update: update tb_information set isNew = 0 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from tb_newsinformation where type=1 ORDER BY createTime DESC
select * from tb_deviceInformation where is_delete=0 ORDER BY time DESC

select i.*,d.information_name typeName from tb_information i LEFT JOIN information_datatype d on d.information_type = i.informationType LEFT JOIN `information_user` iu ON iu.`information_id` = i.`id` WHERE 1=1 and is_delete=0
AND ( iu.`id` IS NULL OR ( iu.`id` IS NOT NULL AND iu.`user_id` != #{user_id} ) )
AND i.informationType = #{informationType}
GROUP BY i.id
SELECT * FROM tb_slideshow ORDER BY createTime DESC

SELECT tb.id as information_id,tb.*,d.information_name as typeName FROM `tb_information` tb LEFT JOIN information_datatype d on tb.informationType = d.information_type WHERE informationType=#{informationType} and user_id=#{user_id} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
select id as information_id,* from tb_information where informationType=#{type}
